scripts.package: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && babel ./src -d dist --copy-files
scripts.generate: cp package.json package.json.backup && swagger-codegen generate -DmoduleName=amber-javascript-sdk -DpackageName=amber-javascript-sdk -DprojectDescription='Boon_Logic_Amber_SDK' -i swagger.json -l javascript -o . && mv package.json.backup package.json
